attributes.action: Petition against UK military involvement in Syria
attributes.additional_details:
After the last 3 interventions in removing so called dictatorial regimes from power namely Iraq, Afghanistan & Libya it is obvious that the military interventions just do not work. All the previous countries are now in a worse state for their people than pre intervention.
The petitioners here signed are AGAINST any form of military intervention which puts British armed forces and the population of Syria in jeopardy.
